Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to comply with a court order
legal_basis: Rule 471 of the Federal Courts Rules
evidence_presented: Respondent was served with an April 2006 order
Witnesses testified about service and non-compliance
decision_reasoning: Can the Respondent be held in contempt and sentenced for failing to comply with a previous court order
result_of_case: Respondent ordered to pay additional costs
procedure_followed: The Applicant filed an ex parte motion seeking a Warrant of Committal
